#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
long long mod=1000000007;
 
 long long power(long long N, long long expo, long long M)
{
    if(expo==0)
        return 1;
    
    if(expo==1)
        return N;
    
    long long half = power(N, expo/2, M);
    
    if(expo%2)
        return half*half%M*N%M;
    
    return half*half%M;
}
int main()
{
	 int t;
	long long ans,n,k;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
	//    count=0;//flag=0;
		cin >> k >> n;
		 
				 if(n==1)
		  cout << "1\n";
		  else if(n==2)
		   cout << k <<"\n";
		 else {
                    
		    ans= power(2,n-3,mod-1);
	     // printf("%lld\n",ans);
            
		    cout << power(k,ans,mod) <<"\n";
	    }
    }
    return 0;
}
